settings.info: This is used in modals and other secondary elements.

settings.label: Size
settings.info: All headings (small and large) will be adjusted.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.info: List of currencies to display. You must separate each currencies by an empty space, and use the ISO 4217 3-letter code. Example: USD CAD EUR. All the possible values are [listed here](http://bit.ly/1C4cZ3w).

settings.label: Reveal elements one by one
settings.info: This setting displays blog post and product grid element one after the other.

settings.label: Show price on hover
settings.info: Prices will always be visible on touch devices.

settings.label: Show free shipping minimum amount
settings.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping).

settings.label: Free shipping minimum amount
settings.info: Only write a number, no letters

settings.label: Share image
settings.info: This image is used when you share pages such as home page. For product, collection or article pages, the featured image will be used instead.
